FuncDef: This command specifies that the configured PBR action is applicable to egress processing. The command should only be enabled in ACL policies used by residential subscribers. Enablingegress-pbron filters not deployed for residential subscribers is not blocked but may lead to unexpected behavior and should be avoided.

ParaDef.Info: Sets load-balancing to the default (hash based on SA/DA of the packet).
Includes TCP/UDP port (if available) in the hash.
